<Extension()> Public Function DetectLanguage (operations As ITextModeration, textContentType As String, textContent As Stream) As DetectedLanguage

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The content type. Possible values include: 'text/plain', 'text/html', 'text/xml', 'text/markdown'
Docs.summary: This operation will detect the language of given input content. Returns the ISO 639-3 code for the predominant language comprising the submitted text. Over 110 languages supported.
